title: Manassas National Battlefield Park: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger         Be a Manassas National Battlefield Park Junior Ranger! NPS Photo  For younger visitors to the park; between 3 and 12 years of age, an age-appropriate Junior Ranger activity booklet is available at the information desk inside the Henry Hill Visitor Center. Budget one to two hours of time to complete the booklet during your visit to the park. Upon successful completion of the booklet, you will be enrolled as a "Junior Ranger" of Manassas National Battlefield Park and you will be rewarded with a patch or a badge for your efforts.  Be sure to ask about the Junior Ranger program at any National Park site you have the chance to visit.
